description: Shikinami Asuka Langley remains the pilot of http://anidb.net/ch8705 [EVA-02] and is now used by http://anidb.net/ch50735 [Wille] as an expendable tool in their struggle against http://anidb.net/ch8705 [Nerv] and their EVAs. Little is seen of Asuka outside action scenes, and she is now the partner of http://anidb.net/ch7701 [Makinami Mari Illustrious]. Together they fight NERV to prevent them from initiating the Fourth Impact.
name: Shikinami Asuka Langley
